articles.title: Imran Tahir pulls out of BBL for personal reasons - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Veteran legspinner won't play for the Renegades after electing to stay on in South Africa
articles.content:
The Melbourne Renegades have suffered another blow with their premier legspinner Imran Tahir withdrawing from the tournament for personal reasons.

articles.author: Eamonn Tiernan
articles.title: Coroner confirms ex-cricketer Dean Jones died of a stroke - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: The Australian cricket icon collapsed in a Mumbai hotel and died at age 59.
articles.content:
Australian cricket great Dean Jones died of a stroke and not a heart attack as was first reported, his wife Jane has confirmed.
